summary: A collection of unit tests that validate various aspects of the data loading pipeline, including BIDS dataframe creation for different modalities, 2D patch extraction and resampling, cache folder handling, dropout input processing, target filename retrieval, microscopy pixel size handling, and PNG/TIF image reading.
business_intent: To ensure the robustness and correctness of the medical imaging data loader components, preventing regressions and guaranteeing reliable dataset preparation for downstream AI models.
